FinServ_LifeEvent__c.name: FinServ_LifeEvent__c
FinServ_LifeEvent__c.description: Represents a clientâ€™s life event, such as a birth or marriage.

Client__c.description: Individual the life event is related to.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies is enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

EventType__c.description: Type of life event. Valid values: College New Baby New Business New Home New Job Retirement

FinancialGoal__c.description: Financial goal that the life event is related to.

GoalType__c.description: Type of financial goal implied by the life event. Valid values: Saving for College Saving for Retirement

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the goal in an external data source.
